website_summaries.verdict: This multi-platform device works for both Android and iOS users.
pros: Can make a wireless Bluetooth connection
cons: The controller is connected to the phone via a bracket, and the combination of phone and controller can become heavy with extended use

customer_reviews.title: Just what I need.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a controller I could map the controls on and use for COD mobile. This works perfectly. I was able to download the app they suggest and fully costumize my buttons how I wanted. It's comfortable to hold and the phone lays at a good angle. It's great.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Pixel 3 XL
customer_reviews.text: This fits my Pixel 3 XL perfectly/even with case on, and the sync was simple I quickly learned that most games don't support this "right out of the box" so I found an app called Octopus that's allows you to map the buttons. Now it's all working great Controller feels good in the hands and the phone doesn't feel like it's going to slip out
customer_reviews.author: TheKansasAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Not great. The bracket is very poor quality. Almost broke first time trying to insert phone. Doesn't fit a wider phone. Got for pubg, but the haven't even had time to use it, as the setup process is insanely detailed and complicated. May be sending this item back for a higher quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Feels Nice - Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: The only good thing about this is the ergonomic feel. But the desperate attempt to copy the PS4 controller tells you everything you need to know - it's cheap and feels that way. The phone bracket is too short and insecure, and the measurements of the bracket in the description is fake. 4/5? PLEASE, what a scam. Look for reviews outside of Amazon and then purchase in Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Aron Knopfler

Warm Tips For Using The Gaming Controller:


Power Management 
(1) Power On 
A. Press a set of keys for 2 seconds to boot to connect a new device. 
B. Press the HOME key for 2 seconds to boot to connect a paired device. 
(2) Power off 
A. In the connected state, long press the Home key until the LED lights off, release the HOME key, shut down the machine successfully; 
B. In pairing state, time out, failed pairing, controller is automatically shut down; 
C. In the connected state, more than 5 minutes no action, the controller is automatically shut down; 
D. In the connected state, when the controller battery voltage is very low, the controller is automatically shut down. 
(3) Low-power alarm, charging and wake-up 
A. In the connected state, when the controller battery is low voltage, the controller LED4 is blinking(low-power alarm). 
B. When the controller battery is low voltage, charging the controller in time. When charging, the charging LED 4 flashes slowly, after full power, the LED 4 is always on. 
C. In the connected state, the controller is automatically shut down and hibernate without any key stroke operation within 5 minutes; When the controller needs to be re-used, press the HOME key for 2 seconds to wake the controller and the controller will be automatically return to the device.
